#summary Info on how to access RubyCAS-Client's source code repository.
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Moved to Github =

*RubyCAS-Client's source code repository has moved to [http://github.com/gunark/rubycas-client/tree/master Github]*

To checkout a copy of the code using `git`:

`git clone git://github.com/gunark/rubycas-client.git `

Feel free to fork the main repo on Github -- this makes it easier for your patches to get pulled into the master branch.

For more information please see:

http://github.com/gunark/rubycas-client
